channel.title: CVE Feed for Arcadia Technology, LLC -- Crafty Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arcadia Technology, LLC -- Crafty Controller

item.title: CVE-2024-1064|2024-07-05T17:21:34.862Z -- arcadia%20technology%2C%20llc -- crafty%20controller
item.description: A host header injection vulnerability in the HTTP handler component of Crafty Controller allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to trigger a Denial of Service (DoS) condition via a modified host header

item.description: A host header injection vulnerability in the HTTP handler component of Crafty Controller allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to trigger a Denial of Service (DoS) condition via a modified host header
